sentences.english: Despite a thorough investigation, on trace of Mary has been found.
sentences.chinese: 儘管查得很徹底，但還是找不到瑪麗的一點蹤跡。

sentences.english: I just looked for her everywhere.
No Asian carp have yet been found in Lake Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根湖還尚未發現亞洲鯉魚的蹤跡。

sentences.english: Green dye shows the trail of water that a jellyfish pulls along as it swims.
sentences.chinese: 綠色染料顯示了水母在水中游泳時水的蹤跡。

sentences.english: The information traffic displayed was enough to render the Invid leave-taking a minor itch.
sentences.chinese: 這些信息足以提供因維人離開的一些蹤跡。

sentences.english: It is almost totally absent in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中國這更是難覓蹤跡。

sentences.english: The rescue team raked the area for a trace of the lost travellers.
sentences.chinese: 營救隊在這一地區仔細搜尋迷途旅客的蹤跡。

sentences.english: After the show, the audience deserts the Blackpool streets.
sentences.chinese: 演出結束後，觀衆從布萊克浦的大街上消失了蹤跡。

sentences.english: Even in companies, traces of this flat structure exists.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在公司裏，這種平面結構的蹤跡也存在。

sentences.english: But chameleons do have great eyesight invaluable to us on our quest for baby lemurs.
sentences.chinese: 但變色龍的視力很好，對於尋找狐猴寶寶蹤跡很有用。

sentences.english: She and some tramps found the trail of rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 她和一些流浪者發現了野兔的蹤跡。

sentences.english: We have lost all trace of him.
Edmund followed the stag's trail and was soon swallowed by the fog.
sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙跟着牡鹿的蹤跡而去，很快便被迷霧吞噬了。

sentences.english: He tried his best to conceal traces so as to elude pursuers.
sentences.chinese: 他嘗試滅跡覆蓋蹤跡以甩掉逃蹤者。

sentences.english: Father of avoid dunning, no sign of drag more female debt collection harassment.
sentences.chinese: 欣父規避追債沒了蹤跡，拖累欣母倍受討債騷擾。

sentences.english: When she checked on them in the morning, they were gone.
sentences.chinese: 當她早晨想一探究竟的時候，發現他們已蹤跡不見。

definition: not to see/not to meet/to have disappeared/to be missing
to realize suddenly/to wake up with a start
one after another/in succession/one by one/continuously/diverse/in profusion/numerous and confused/pell-mell
to look for/to seek/to find fault
